summary: I am the Owner and Principal Consultant at Maven Project Management, LLC (www.mavenprojectmanagement.com)I'm PMP and Agile/Scrum certified with nearly 20 years of technology project management experience. I've worked in many types of environments - from start-ups to large corporations - in healthcare, technology, consulting, real estate and other industries.My passion is helping growing companies become more productive and efficient by determining the best combination of process, tools and training to keep projects on track for long-term growth and success.    Services include:* Project management process/methodology implementation for IT, software teams and PMOs* Business systems implementation - EPM/PPM, CRM, Document Management and others* Project management - Software/web/application development projects, IT infrastructure, M&A and other strategic initiatives.  Cross-functional team leadership expertise for large, complex projects.
